definitions.text: not correct; not in conformity with fact or truth
examples: the report in the paper is wrong
the clock showed the wrong time
found themselves on the wrong road

definitions.text: not in accord with established usage or procedure
examples: the wrong way to shuck clams
it is incorrect for a policeman to accept gifts

definitions.text: (of a word or expression) not agreeing with grammatical principles
characterized by errors; not agreeing with a model or not following established rules; ; ; the wrong side of the road"
